sentences.sContent: There are only 7 girls in our PE class, so the class is mostly boys.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are only 7 girls in our PE class, so the class is mostly boys.
sentences.sCn: 在我们体育班仅有7个女孩，因此这个班大多数是男生。

sentences.sContent: eg. There are only 7 girls in our PE class , so the class is mostly boys.
sentences.sContent_eng: eg. There are only 7 girls in our PE class , so the class is mostly boys.
sentences.sCn: 在我们体育班仅有7个女孩，因此这个班大多数是男生。

sentences.sContent: It made her, an ambitious girl, feel very depressed and fear taking PE class.
sentences.sContent_eng: It made her, an ambitious girl, feel very depressed and fear taking PE class.
sentences.sCn: 这让好胜心极强的她感到非常沮丧，甚至害怕上体育课。
